title: Flipper Potion
summaries: The Flipper Potion is a buff potion which grants the Flipper buff when consumed. The buff allows the player to move horizontally and vertically through all three liquids (water, lava, and honey) without slowing down, and also allows the player to swim without any swimming accessory equipped. This lasts for 8 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

statistics.Tooltip: Lets you move swiftly in liquids
statistics.Sell: 2 SC
